Interface ITracer<EventElement>

Type Parameters:

All Known Implementing Classes:
KTBSTracer, KTBSTracerFfffffffffff, NamedPipeTracer, Tracer, XMLStreamTracer, XMLTracer
public interface ITracer<EventElement>

Generates Ernest's activity traces.

Author:
ogeorgeon
